overview: Dawn in a secluded camp of tramps on the outskirts of the city. A couple formed by a little girl and a hooded stranger gets up to roam the streets looking for food and asking for alms. Only when they return to the "home" do we discover that their relationship is based on a very particular dependence. A story that tries to deepen social relations and psychological slavery through the child perspective of a 6-year-old girl.
title: Hopes
